statements: DELETE FROM compliance_report WHERE user_id = 100 AND report_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE user_id = 100 AND risk_score > 0.7;
DELETE FROM compliance_report WHERE report_date < '2021-09-01' AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM ComplianceReport WHERE account_id = 100 AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM RiskAssessment WHERE account_id = 100 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CryptocurrencyActivity WHERE activity_type = 'BUY' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM audit_log WHERE action_performed = 'deleted record';
